name: Faerie Rings
description: Circular formations of mushrooms or stones serve as gateways to the Feywild and create places where mortals can interact with fey creatures. The fey connection provides access to unique magic and knowledge, while the dangerous fey inhabitants and unpredictable magic create constant risk.
atmosphere: Circular formations shimmer with fey magic while fey creatures move with ethereal grace and unpredictable purpose. The air carries visible distortions and reality shifts from unpredictable magic. Every surface vibrates with enchanted energy. Your skin tingles with fey magic and the sense of unpredictable risk.
